SCTX - Script Source:
SCN mwShrineMountKandScript

; Mount Kand Shrine
; Applied to the tribunal shrine associated with the quest.
; This script is minimally functional and still mostly in Morrowind Scripting Language.
; It can be reworked when the Dunmer Temple quests are rebuilt.

Begin OnActivate

	if ( GetStage fbmwTTMountKand < 75 )
		MessageBox "Here Vivec won a contest of wits with three Daedra. After enraging them with his answers, he used their bones to build houses for his people."
		Return

		Cast 0shrineUmountkandUsp Player

	else
		SetStage fbmwTTMountKand 100
	endif

End
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 27 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
